title: GitHub Issues Provider Config
description: Provider-specific configuration for GitHub Issues ticketing

labels.description: Map of unit discipline to GitHub label arrays

story_points.description: Whether to set story point estimates (requires GitHub Projects custom field)

epic_link.description: Whether to link unit issues to a milestone or tracked-by parent issue

issue_links.description: Whether to create task list references from unit depends_on DAG

milestone.description: GitHub milestone name or number to use as the epic equivalent

project_number.description: GitHub Projects (v2) board number to add issues to

details.description: Additional issue content requirements (field name to requirement level)
